summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley, expressing confusion over a lack of response from others he spoke to. The email contains a confidentiality notice and suggests it may be attorney-client privileged.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, expressing his thoughts on a lack of response from others.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the recipient of the email from Epstein.

connections.description: Epstein is communicating with Staley, indicating a relationship where Epstein expects feedback or interaction.

keyFacts: The email was sent on March 17, 2011.
Epstein expresses confusion over a lack of response from others he spoke to.
The email contains a confidentiality notice indicating it may be attorney-client privileged.
